message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. I'm willing to sell it to you for a price that's lower than $100, but I need you to make a decision now. If you buy it, you'll know its quality immediately. If you don't buy it, I'll reveal its quality and you can make a decision in the next round. What do you say?
I trust your recommendation and will purchase the product for $100.
